sense.def:
One's temper
je človekova lastnost, da se hitro razjezi ali da ostane miren.

seg.quote: He had a most violent temper.

gramGrp.pos:
COUNT N
or
UNCOUNT N
with
SUPP

sense.def:
One's temper
je tudi človekovo splošno razpoloženje.

seg.quote: She might come home in a better temper.

sense.def:
To temper something
pomeni narediti nekaj manj skrajno ali bolj sprejemljivo;

seg.quote: Our delight was tempered by surprise.

sense.def:
Kdor je
in a temper
, je zelo jezen in se ne more obvladati.

seg.quote: One day the man attacked me in a temper.

sense.def:
To lose one's temper
pomeni postati zelo jezen.

seg.quote: She suddenly lost her temper and left the room.
